results.title: Kostas
results.creator_credit: Bernard Eddy, Videoscope Australia, Film Victoria and Paul Cox
results.brief_description: A lonely Melbourne divorcee falls in love with a Greek taxi driver. The film explores the path the romance follows, and how the couple overcome their differences of class and culture. Starring Wendy Hughes, Takis Emmanuel, Kris McQuade, Chris Haywood.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bernard Eddy, Videoscope Australia, Film Victoria and Paul Cox

results.title: Kolya
results.creator_credit: Jan Sverak, Eric Abraham, Pandora Cinema, Ceska televize, Portobello Pictures and Biograf Jan Sverak
results.brief_description: Louka is a middle-aged Czech who loves women, hates the idea of commitment and owes more money than he can earn playing the cello in a funeral orchestra. When a friend suggests he make a little ‘easy money’ by entering into an arranged marriage, with a Russian woman seeking citizenship, Louka reluctantly agrees. But it’s a decision that will throw his life into chaos…and change it forever. When the marriage is completed his new ‘wife’ is on the first plane to Germany leaving behind her five year old son for Louka to care for. So now this confirmed bachelor must become a father.. this grumpy old man and an innocent kid must learn to live together, even though they don’t speak the same language. This is a funny, touching and unforgettable story that will touch your heart. Winner of the Academy Award for Best Foreign Film. Contains Czech and Russian language with English subtitles.

results.title: Knud
results.creator_credit: Contemporary Films, Nuna Film and Jorgen Roos
results.brief_description: The story of Knud Rasmussen, an explorer from Denmark. Charts his private and public life on his expeditions across the North American Arctic. Commentary by Palle Koch.

results.title: Knights of the Round Table
results.creator_credit: Richard Thorpe, Pandro S. Berman and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
results.brief_description:
Based on Sir Thomas Malory’s “Le Morte D’Arthur”, this is a tale of chivalry, honour, tragic love and intrigue. At the famous Round Table, established by Arthur to uphold peace, justice and chivalry, sits the gallant Lancelot, Percival and the evil Modred, consort to Arthur’s half-sister, Morgan Le Fay, who is determined to snatch the crown and bring chaos to the realm. The powerful Merlin can do nothing to circumvent the futile love between Lancelot and Queen Guinevere, the consequences of which will not only split the kingdom, but destroy the friendship between the King and his most trusted Knight. All the pageantry and splendour of the age are here.
Cast includes: Robert Taylor, Ava Gardner, Mel Ferrer, Anne Crawford, Stanley Baker and Felix Aylmer.

results.title: King David
results.creator_credit: Ken Adam, Bruce Beresford, Martin Elfand and Paramount Pictures
results.brief_description: Traces the life of the lowly shepherd boy who ascended to the throne of ancient Israel from his childhood battle with Goliath to his self-destructive passion for Bathsheba. Stars Richard Gere.

results.title: Kika
results.creator_credit: Pedro Almodovar, Esther Garcia, Agustin Almodovar and Ciby
results.brief_description: An intriguing web of desire, deceit and death are expertly woven together in this effervescent satire by the unrepentantly twisted director Pedro Almodovar. The madness begins with motormouth make-up artist Kika (Veronique Forque) being summoned to the home of ex-pat American writer Nicholas (Peter Coyote) to make over the corpse of his step-son, Ramon (Alex Casanovas). During her ministrations, Ramon awakens from a cataleptic trance, and the pair fall in love. Complicating their bizarre relationship further are Kika’s sporadic involvement with Nicholas, the lustful adoration of her maid, Juana (Rossy de Palma), and Ramon’s demented ex-girlfriend, Andrea Scarface (Victoria Abril), the host of the voyeuristic reality television show, `Today’s Worst’. Committed to turning private lives inside out for a scoop, Andrea zips around Madrid on a motorcycle with a camera strapped to her crash helmet. Things truly take a turn for the outrageous when Juana’s psychotic ex-porn star brother, Pablo, appears on the scene after breaking out of jail, with Andrea hot on his heels. An explicit but entertaining film filled with fabulous imagery and dazzling costumes from famous fashion designers Jean Paul Gaultier and Gianni Versace. Veronique Forque won a Goya Award for Best Lead Actress for her portrayal of Kika. In Spanish with English subtitles.

results.title: Key Largo
results.creator_credit: John Huston, Jerry Wald and Warner Bros Pictures
results.brief_description: Frank McCloud (Humphrey Bogart) travels to an island in the Florida Keys to visit the widow of a war buddy. At the hotel where he stays, he encounters crass gangster Johnny Rocco (Edward G. Robinson). Rocco and his henchmen have taken over the hotel and McCloud must decide whether to become involved or to remain aloof. The stage is set for a rich confrontation between Rocco, who is forcefully oppressive and the one man who can do something - McCloud. Based on the play by Maxwell Anderson.

results.title: Junior Bonner
results.creator_credit: Sam Peckinpah, Joe Wizan and ABC Pictures (US)
results.brief_description: Sam Peckinpah eschews his slow-motion bullet ballets for this quiet character study of ex-rodeo cowboy turned drifter, Junior Bonner, who returns home to Arizona to reconcile with the family he hasn’t seen in years. Bonner is shocked to see that the solid family he was hoping to come back to is breaking apart. His parents, Ace and Elvira, have separated, and his brother Curley has turned into a heartless real estate tycoon, parcelling off sections of his parents’ land for quick money. With nowhere to turn and nowhere to run, Bonner has to face himself and try to find a way to regain his self-respect. Cast includes: Steve McQueen, Robert Preston, Ida Lupino, Ben Johnson and Joe Don Baker.

results.title: Johnny Mnemonic
results.creator_credit: Robert Longo, Don Carmody and ANM
results.brief_description: A snapshot of the future, the year 2021. Corporations rule and the world is threatened by a new plague, NAS; Nerve Attenuation Syndrome. To protect data it must be smuggled through mnemonic carriers who carry the data through a computer chip implanted into the brain; Johnny Mnemonic (Keanu Reeves) is one such carrier. Johnny’s present mission is to carry data from two scientists who have defected from one of the world’s largest corporations, taking the information from Japan to America. The upload of information carried in Johnny’s brain surpasses anything he has carried before and he must find the secret access code that will allow him to download the information, otherwise he will die. Also starring Dolph Lundgren, Takeshi Kitano, Ice-T and Dina Meyer.

results.title: Johnny Guitar
results.creator_credit: Nicholas Ray, Herbert J. Yates and Republic Entertainment International
results.brief_description: A reformed gunfighter returns to a woman he had abandoned years earlier. She is now the proprietor of a gambling saloon opened in anticipation of the arrival of the railroad and in the face of hostile opposition from the local townspeople. The film’s bizarre, even baroque, intensity derives in part from the central antagonism between two women (virtually unique in the western), and in Yordan and Ray’s expressed intention of seeking an anti-McCarthy parable.
